PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-10332021-12-17,  PSPC,  OAG,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Ernst & Young as the Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of the CANADA POST CORPORATION for the financial year ending on December 31, 2021.
PrecisOrder appointing (a) Ernst & Young as the AUDITOR; and (b) the Auditor General of Canada as JOINT AUDITOR of the CANADA POST CORPORATION for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
